manifest.install: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_vivawjw_change_car`; CREATE TABLE `ims_vivawjw_change_car` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `uid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `carname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `carnum` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `cartype` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, `caraddr` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `carphone` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `cartime` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `status` int(1) DEFAULT '2', `turndown` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `sittime` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `chcartype` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, `chcarnum` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `chcarpapers` varchar(6) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `uid` (`uid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=8 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_vivawjw_change_driver`; CREATE TABLE `ims_vivawjw_change_driver` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `uid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `drname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `drcard` varchar(18) DEFAULT NULL, `drivernum` varchar(18) DEFAULT NULL, `driverpapers` varchar(6) DEFAULT NULL, `drnum` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `draddr` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `drphone` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `drtime` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `status` int(1) DEFAULT '2', `turndown` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `sittime` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `uid` (`uid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=7 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
